mapper.sql: ifnull(a.id,'') AS "id", ifnull(a.create_by,'') AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", ifnull(a.update_by,'') AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", ifnull(a.remarks,'') AS "remarks", ifnull(a.del_flag,'') AS "delFlag", ifnull(a.picture,'') AS "picture", ifnull(a.state,'') AS "state", a.issue_time AS "issueTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advertisement( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, picture, state, issue_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{picture}, #{state}, #{issueTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE advertisement SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, picture = #{picture}, state = #{state}, issue_time = #{issueTime} WHERE id = #{id}
